bt.data.digest

Class JavaSecurityDigester

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.data.digest.JavaSecurityDigester
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Digester

    public class JavaSecurityDigester
extends Object
implements Digester
    A class to produce arbitrary digests for DataRange or Range. Uses java security libraries to produce the digests

      • digest

        public byte[] digest(DataRange data)
        Description copied from interface: Digester
        Calculates a digest of a data range.

        Important: If some of the data can't be read immediately (e.g. due to idiosyncrasies of underlying storage), then this method may return incorrect result.

        Specified by:
        digest in interface Digester
        Returns:
        Digest (depends on the algorithm being used)

      • digestForced

        public byte[] digestForced(DataRange data)
        Description copied from interface: Digester
        Calculates a digest of a data range. Throws IllegalStateException if any StorageUnit does not return enough data.
        Specified by:
        digestForced in interface Digester
        Returns:
        Digest (depends on the algorithm being used)
